name: QuestionnaireAdmissionRouteOfAdministration
title: Questionnaire Admission Route Of Administration
description: Usual route of administration during most recent use period on admission.

concept.display: Smoking (pipe/cigarette) - may use a pipe, cigarette, or other apparatus
Inhalation (nose/mouth) - Insufflations via the nose or mouth; does not include smoking
Injection (IV/IM) - Intravenous, intramuscularly, subcutaneous, or any other administration involving the use of needles
Other - Any method of drug administration not described by any of the above codes
